title: Thar She Drones: New Technology Helps Track Gray Whales
teaser: Two San Diego-based scientists are using new technology to get a bird's eye view of once-endangered gray whales.
contentencoded:
Southern California whale watchers are reporting a busier than usual migration season for the once endangered gray whales. The mammals migrate along the California shore capturing the attention of casual observers and researchers.

KPBS environment reporter Erik AndersonÂ says two San Diego-based scientists are using some new technology to get a bird’s eye view of the species.
